text: Dana Elza is a decorative artist whose work bridges traditional craftsmanship and contemporary surface design. Her studio practice reflects decades of experience in both fine and applied arts.
Her projects include historic restorations, custom finishes, and large-scale installations for private and public spaces. Each piece explores how texture, color, and light define visual character.
